Name: Spark and Sparkle
About the game: One-on-one jigsaw building, scrolling-shooter action! It's a classic, head-to-head puzzle challenge, but monsters won't stop showing up, and they might even get in your way! Defeat them to earn gems - Collect gems to get the items and puzzle pieces you'll need! Place pieces correctly and things get harder for your opponent! The player to complete their puzzle first is the winner! Features 8 playable characters, each with different abilities! Single-player Arcade Mode! Set up single matches and play with a friend locally, or against the computer! Online competition! Invite friends to play, or challenge strangers! Over 150 puzzles to gather as you play! Practice building puzzles in the Gallery!
